  2. One UI 7 lets you stop HDR photos from making your screen super bright  Android Authority
  3. Samsung will let you disable annoyingly-bright HDR content across all apps  The Verge
  4. One UI 7 adds new setting to control HDR photo brightness on Galaxy phones  PhoneArena
  5. Android Update: Samsung One UI 7 Update Will Let Users Disable 'Super HDR' Content  Bizz Buzz

item.title: How to Steal an AI Model Without Actually Hacking Anything - Gizmodo
